argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ismgmALT.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | ismgmALT.o | |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( +g ` m ) = ( +g ` M ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( m = M -> ( +g ` m ) = .o. ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` m ) = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( m = M -> ( Base ` m ) = B ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_breq12d | |- ( m = M -> ( ( +g ` m ) assLaw ( Base ` m ) <-> .o. assLaw B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-sgrp2 | |- SGrpALT = { m e. MgmALT | ( +g ` m ) assLaw ( Base ` m ) } |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( M e. SGrpALT <-> ( M e. MgmALT /\ .o. assLaw B ) ) |
